Sentencas: This study was aimed at developing a suitable reforming catalyst for later application in an indirect internal reforming solid oxide fuel cell (IIR-SOFC) fuelled by dimethyl ether (DME).
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: It was found that, at temperature higher than 800 degrees C, DME decomposed homogeneously producing CH4 and CH3OH with small amount of CO, CO2, and H-2.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: High surface area Ce-ZrO2 can reform DME with steam efficiently at 900 degrees C, producing high contents of H-2, CO, and CH4 without the presence of CH3OH in the product gas.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: The combination use of Ce-ZrO2 (as a pre-reforming catalyst) and Ni/Al2O3 in the single unit was proven to significantly improve the reforming performance.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: According to this combination, the role of Ce-ZrO2 is to first decompose CH3OH and some CH4 generated from the homogeneous decomposition of DME, while the role of Ni/Al2O3 is to reform CH4 left from the pre-reforming section and to maximize the yield of H-2 production.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: As another approach, IIR-SOFC model was studied using an annular ceramic reactor, in which DME initially reacted with steam on CeZrO2 + Ni/Al2O3 at the inner side of the reactor and then Ni/YSZ at the outer side.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: The stability and the yield of hydrogen production over this configuration were considerably higher than those of systems packed with single Ce-ZrO2, single Ni/Al2O3, and without the filling of catalyst.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: In addition, the degree of carbon formation on the surface of Ni/YSZ was significantly low.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)

Sentencas: The successful development of this reforming pattern improves the efficiency of IIR-SOFC fueled by DME by eliminating the requirement of an external reforming unit installation.
Titulo: Catalytic steam reforming of dimethyl ether (DME) over high surface area Ce-ZrO2 at SOFC temperature:: The possible use of DME in indirect internal reforming operation (IIR-SOFC)
